title: New config option: remember_for_extendable
body:
This is the first draft of a new config option for rememberable: 

remember_for_extendable: if set to true, this allows a user's remember token to be extended indefinitely and between different web browsers if they log in before their token expires. By default remember_for_extendable is false.

This new option might also be broken into 2 separate options instead.

In that case, one option might be remember_me_across_browsers (don't generate a new token if the existing token has not expired) and the other might be remember_me_extendable (allow token expiration to be extended if the user keeps logging in before their token expires). 

I made this into one option because it's something I think is generally applicable to applications where very strict security isn't needed, and because reusing the existing token between browsers without extending the expiration may lead to shorter "remember me" times for the secondary browsers.

Comments, feedback, etc all more than welcome. Thanks!

http://github.com/trevorturk/devise/commit/07a1b0e3f4bf4fe9d6fe0a9dd48ebf94ffde5b58
